member.summary: Represents a descriptor for an activity.

member.param: The ID for this entity.
The culture the culture specific fields are provided in.
The human readable name of the entity.
A description of the entity and what it does.
The path of the icon used to represent this descriptor.
Specifies a set of taxonomies and the classification values for the entity in each taxonomy.
The parameters the activity accepts and should be input by the user.

Lists dependent activities which must be included in the plan before this activity.

The ID of the editor used to edit the properties of the activity.

member.summary: Defines a descriptor for an activity.

member.summary: The parameters the activity accepts and should be input by the user.

member.summary: The legal paths leading out of the activity to the next activity.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.MarketingAutomation.Locators.AutomationPlans.Model.IActivityDescriptor.Dependencies
member.summary: Lists dependent activities which must be included in the plan before this activity.
member.remarks: The dependent activity must be on the same plan path as the current activity; it must be visited when walking up the plan tree from the current activity to the entry activity.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.MarketingAutomation.Locators.AutomationPlans.Model.IActivityDescriptor.ImplementationType
member.summary: The full .net type (including namespace and assembly) of the type implementing the activity.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Xdb.MarketingAutomation.Locators.AutomationPlans.Model.IActivityDescriptor.EditorId
member.summary: The ID of the editor used to edit the properties of the activity.
member.remarks: If this property is populated it is expected the editor will edit all parameters of the activity. Individual activity editors will not be used.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Xdb.MarketingAutomation.Locators.IDescriptorLocator`1
member.summary: Defines a general locators for a descriptor.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Xdb.MarketingAutomation.Locators.IDescriptorLocator`1.GetDescriptor(System.Guid,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Locates a descriptor by the given ID.
member.param: The ID of the descriptor to get.
The culture to get the descriptor in.
member.returns: The found descriptor, ornull if the descriptor wasn't found.
member.remarks: Returns culture specific properties (such as Name and Description in the provided culture.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Xdb.MarketingAutomation.Locators.IDescriptorLocator`1.GetAllDescriptors(System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all descriptors the locator finds.
member.param: The culture to get the descriptors in.
The page number of the results to retrieve.
The size of each page of results.
member.returns: The paged descriptors, or an empty if no descriptors were found.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Xdb.MarketingAutomation.Locators.IDescriptorLocator`1.GetDescriptorsByClassification(System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all entity descriptors which have the provided value in the specified taxonomy.
member.param: The culture to get the descriptors in.
The ID of the taxonomy.
The required value in the specified taxonomy.
The page number of the results to retrieve.
The size of each page of results.
member.returns: The paged descriptors, or an empty if no descriptors were found.
member.remarks: This is a "contains" check. The entity may have other values in the provided taxonomy.
